  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113944</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cavendish's method for measuring G</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Methode Cavendishs für das Messen von von G</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La méthode de Cavendish pour mesurer G</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Método de Cavendish para medir G</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metodo del Cavendish per la misurazione del G</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέθοδος Cavendish για το γ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Método de Cavendish para medir G</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a representation of the experimental set-up used by Cavendish in measuring the gravitational constant G using four lead spheres.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experimental set-up</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravitational constant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead spheres</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Darstellung der 
experimentellen Installation, die von Cavendish im Messen der 
Gravitationskonstante G mit vier Leitung Bereichen verwendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une représentation de 
l'installation expérimentale employée par Cavendish en mesurant la 
constante de la gravité G en utilisant quatre sphères de fil de 
sortie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma respresentação da 
instalação experimental usada por Cavendish em medir a constante 
gravitacional G usando quatro esferas da ligação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una rappresentazione 
della messa a punto sperimentale usata da Cavendish nella misurazione 
del costante gravitazionale G usando quattro sfere del cavo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια αντιπροσώπευση της 
πειραματικής οργάνωσης που χρησιμοποιείται από Cavendish στη 
μέτρηση του βαρύτητας σταθερού γ χρησιμοποιώντας τέσσερις 
σφαίρες μολύβδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una representación de 
la disposición experimental usada por Cavendish en medir la constante
gravitacional G usando cuatro esferas del terminal de componente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">experimentelle Installation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
